mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tp.prj_id as projectId, tp.name as title FROM TBL_TASK tt, TBL_PROJECT tp WHERE tt.prj_id = tp.prj_id AND tt.manager_id = #{empId}

SELECT tou.OUT_ID, tof.original_name, tof.volume, tof.volume_text, te.name, tou.cat_id, tof.update_at, tp.name AS project_name FROM TBL_OUTPUT tou, TBL_OUT_FILE tof, TBL_EMP te, TBL_TASK tt, TBL_PROJECT tp WHERE tou.OUT_ID = tof.OUT_ID AND tou.emp_id = te.emp_id AND tou.TASK_ID = tt.TASK_ID AND tt.PRJ_ID = tp.PRJ_ID AND tou.emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY tou.out_id desc

SELECT tof.original_name, tof.save_name, toc.category, tot.out_type, tou.content FROM TBL_OUTPUT tou, TBL_OUT_FILE tof, TBL_OUT_TYPE tot, TBL_OUT_CATEGORY toc WHERE tou.out_id = tof.out_id AND tou.out_type_id = tot.out_type_id AND tou.cat_id = toc.cat_id AND tou.task_id = #{taskId} AND tou.emp_id = #{empId}
